remarks: Obsolete version of ~ df-ghm as of 15-Mar-2020.  Define the set of group homomorphisms from ` g ` to ` h ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Feb-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-ghomOLD $p |- GrpOpHom = ( g e. GrpOp , h e. GrpOp |-> { f | ( f : ran g --> ran h /\ A. x e. ran g A. y e. ran g ( ( f ` x ) h ( f ` y ) ) = ( f ` ( x g y ) ) ) } ) $.
$d f g h x y $.
